=================================================================== --- howto/apache.xml (revision 465431) +++ howto/apache.xml (working copy) @@ -244,16 +244,27 @@

+Note: this file may also be generated as $TOMCAT_HOME/conf/auto/mod_jk.conf +

+ +

This will tell Apache to use directives in the mod_jk.conf-auto file in the Apache configuration. This file is created by enabling the Apache auto-configuration as follows, in your server.xml file. Please note that this example is specific to Tomcat 5.x, unlike other sections of this document - which also apply to previous Tomcat branches. + which also apply to previous Tomcat branches. Also, this entry goes within the block for your current + 'Engine', not in a block of its own.

... <Engine ...> + . + . + . <Listener className="org.apache.jk.config.ApacheConfig" modJk="/path/to/mod_jk.so" /> - </Engine> + . + . + . + </Engine> ...

Created attachment 19028
Patch to documentation on automating Tomcat to generate Apache conf file
